name: FlyforSurgery
overview:
FlyForSurgery is a consultant to individuals and organizations seeking cost effective medical solutions. Due to disparities in the cost of medical care in different countries, FlyForSurgery is able to design solutions for its clients which make the best of use of their money - often saving them upto 80% of total costs compared to their own country, while providing world class standards of healthcare.

FlyforSurgery has partnerships with India’s most respected hospitals located in 26 cities, including New Delhi, Mumbai, Bangalore, Hyderabad, and Chennai. All facilitation services are provided free of cost to the patient except some optional premium services.
